Description: Faience amulet in the form of a ram.
Curator's comments: Description in Salzmann's letter: Sheep (ram) white porcelain. Attribution to find-spot is based on Auguste Salzmann's letter to Charles Newton, dated 20 August 1860, in which he describes the contents of a paving hole near the Athena temple on Kamiros acropolis. The letter is kept in the Central Archives of the British Museum.
Bibliographic references: Webb 1978 / Archaic Greek Faience, Miniature scent bottles and related objects from East Greece, 650-500BC (450)
